markdownRemark.html:
Bill Simmons: What’s going on with the Sun’s training staff? They have magical powers…
Steve Nash: <completely deadpan> Steroids.

Via Simmons’s 8/20 Podcast.

frontmatter.title: I Love Steve Nash Even More
